reviews.author: Margaret E.
reviews.review: Wish I could give zero stars. Never had an issue with a property management company before this one (call me lucky I suppose). However, this company finds sneaky ways to charge you fees (not small ones), and their customer service team will deflect and ignore any concerns you have regarding the clarity or legitimacy of said fees. Reaching out to the owner, Rachel, was also not helpful as she never answered any emails and the rest of her team would not ever put me in touch with her. Above all, Access's customer service was the worst I've ever dealt with. Customer service is hard work but they were consistently beyond rude any time we called, acting like it was a massive inconvenience to deal with anything.

reviews.author: Alicia P.
reviews.review: If you enjoy renting from a company that actively steals from you, tries to upcharge without checking info, and doesn't care about their tenants than access is right for you! While renting from them for one year we experienced water coming up from the floor boards and were told this was a normal and ongoing issue and they would "look into it", they did not. We experienced plumbing issues, including waste leaking in from the upstairs unit, and Access was unhelpful and unconcerned. After an attempted break in we had to threaten them, as they kept hanging up, in order to have basic security measures enforced such as nailing the windows so no one could sneak in again. Additionally we were repeatedly "charged" for utilities and bills that were not in our name but in the last tenants information. This billing issue took over three months to fix and because of their speedy turnover in personnel we never talked to the same person twice. This company will take full advantage of anyone and especially college renters who may not be familiar with renters rights, an issue I now know by heart. I would give them negative stars if I could. Please avoid this godawful agency at all costs. I wish I had seen a review like this before I had signed a lease.

reviews.author: Ludi C.
reviews.review: Access refused our request to do the inspection walk through for check-out. I had never come across a company so uncooperative. Then I found out why- they took almost $600 from out deposit ! I had NEVER experienced such a huge amount taken out. We cleaned! The checkout notes said we damaged things that were already damaged. The damages even showed in their rental advertisements. When confronted with the advertisement pictures showing the damages, Access then changed their story and said all $600 was for 10 hours of cleaning. They also charged us $60 for changing a battery in the smoke detector when we already changed it. They did not listen, just took our money like some god damn robber. This family owned business is a family of thieves who prey on especially young inexperienced rentors. I'm considering taking them to small claims court to get our money back!

reviews.author: Jaspreet T.
reviews.review:
Access has good people that seem to mean well but some are incompetent at their job. If you decide to move forward with them, expect poor service on weekends, independently check on your property after the tenant moves out, and most importantly, check their math! 

During my experience, I had rude customer service when I called on a Saturday, my property smelled of wet dog after the tenant moved out, and I was overcharged on multiple occasions. Access was quick to correct their accounting mistakes when I pointed them out so I would highly encourage anyone who uses their services to double check their invoices and challenge them as necessary - I was overcharged multiple times during my ~6 months with access.

The aforementioned inconveniences make the overall experience unpleasant. To the access team, I recommend double checking invoices before sending them out and maintaining an open line of communication with owners.

reviews.author: Donald B.
reviews.review: My particular experience with this company was far from positive.  They cancelled a showing 30 minutes prior and then as a consolation said that I could show up at a group showing to get involved with a circus.  I am inclined to never do business with them.  I hate the fact that it is a landlords market where they can treat everyone like they are in the hunger games.

reviews.author: LaVerne S.
reviews.review: We're new to Washington and found Access to be very helpful in finding a new home in the Bellingham area.  The staff was welcoming and helpful - every detail, both small and large, was anticipated and well managed.  Thanks for making such a great first impression for our new home town.

reviews.author: Meghan M.
reviews.review: I scheduled a showing that was confirmed by text multiple times. When I showed up for my scheduled showing, there were four others waiting as well. Nobody showed up. We later found out the house was already occupied. Very poorly managed.

reviews.author: Rusty S.
reviews.review:
ATTENTION BELLINGHAM STUDENTS,
ACCESS IS ESSENTIALLY THE COMCAST OF RENTAL AGENCIES

This is the first business that has ever been so thoroughly unethical, that I felt compelled to warn the public about them.

These people are scam artists through and through; preying on the young and financially challenged. Their business seems to generate a significant portion of its income from fines, fees and extravagant move out charges. 

They are very good at making it abundantly clear that their only goal is to generate profit and any expense. 

Additionally, it seems that their business is very disorganized. They can not seem to keep track of any maintenance requests or documentation. After several written requests for repairs to features that were damaged upon move-in, we eventually gave up and just accepted that we were going to have to live with the pre-existing damage. Little did we know they would attempt to hold us financially responsible for said damage upon move-out.  

These people are not to be trusted and will take any action necessary to exert their power over the young and under privileged. If you attempt to dispute any of their actions or charges they will NOT hesitate to block youfrom contacting them, or even go as far as to take preemptive legal action against you.


You have been warned.

reviews.author: Kyle A.
reviews.review: The owners truly care about their customers and have very agreeable in assisting me as a renter.

reviews.author: Alyssa T.
reviews.review: STAY AWAY! Access just wants your money, is horrible at getting back to you about SERIOUS issues (until you threaten to sue them), and does not include everything they advertise! I will never rent through them again and I suggest everyone and anyone stay away if at all possible.

reviews.author: Cheryll K.
reviews.review: As 2017 draws to a close, we want to thank Access for another year free of rental-home worry! The Access team takes good care of us and our tenants. Prompt, courteous, absolutely dependable and completely professional, the folks at Access problem-solve 24/7 so we don't have to. Nothing ever falls through the cracks, and their reports and accounting are impeccably done. Thanks, Access! You're the best.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Cheryll, You are an absolute pleasure to work for!

reviews.author: Scott M.
reviews.review: Access has been excellent from day one!  Have worked with several local Property Management firms over the last 8+ years, and they're the best around.  Highly Recommend!!

ownerResponse.text: Thanks Scott, It's great working with you too!

reviews.author: Susanne S.
reviews.review: Access manages our condominium complex extremely competently with only a few relatively minor glitches.  Phone calls are returned and emails responded to in a timely manner.  I can't imagine anyone better to work with than Access.  Personnel are cheerful and accommodating.

reviews.author: Dana B.
reviews.review: Access is a great place to rent with! Their staff is courteous and professional, far beyon any other rental agency located in Bellingham. I recommend them to anyone looking for an excellent rental experience.

reviews.author: Donna W.
reviews.review:
Rudest owner around in property management,...  AND SHE WAS WORKING FOR ME!  ...   Procrastinates everything by saying she is working on it.  Closed minded, unwilling to consider any suggestions. Forgets who she is working for.  She is going to do what benefits her and at her convienence only, and that is that!

I gave this service 2 stars because she has some very nice, intelligent and personable employees.  Otherwise, she personally, gets zero stars from me.

reviews.author: Cheryll K.
reviews.review: We have been very pleased with the services of Access Real Estate during the almost four years we've worked with them. We can't imagine a more responsive, courteous, and capable group of people.

reviews.author: Jaya V.
reviews.review: We've been using Access for property management for a few years now and have been very pleased with them. They have notified us of any problems with our rental property and given us the choice of fixing it or having them hire someone to do it. They find new tenants, collect rents and pay us, all without a hitch. Personnel have changed over the time we've been usuing them, but we've always been treated politely.

reviews.author: Beth M.
reviews.review: Drove over 6 hours only for one of our scheduled showings to have been forgotten about so we waited 20 minutes in a parking lot for nothing. Another house we looked at had rotting beams under the raised parking and overall disrepair and uncleanliness, exposed pipes, garbage under the home, etc. One prospective tenant described the beams as "rickety" and was immediately snapped at by an employee who insisted that the overhanging platform was a part of the road (it wasn't).

reviews.author: Dave M.
reviews.review: Worst service I have received by a real estate company in Bellingham. This town is notorious for having its shady real estate services that exploits the students in the community. Access is a perfect example of this. Very unprofessional and rude

reviews.author: Kristen R.
reviews.review:
COLLEGE STUDENTS BEWARE!!!!
This company uses deceptive and dishonest business practices. Please be sure and READ everything before you sign. This business is in the habit of taking advantage of college students who trust them. After working with Alex on a matter pertaining to my son's lease, I requested to speak with his supervisor. FIVE times. I was never given the information. I feel like the supervisor was aware of the situation and chose not to speak with me.
DECEPTIVE. DISHONEST. SNEAKY.  SHAMEFUL.
If I could give less stars I would.

reviews.author: G.k. Pearson
reviews.review: I've been renting from Access for several months.  They were upfront,  transparent about the application and move in process. I've had one repair request that was taken care of immediately. All of my inquires, concerns etc have been

ownerResponse.text:
G.K.  Thank you for taking the time to write your nice review.  I will let Bryan know about your kind words.  Regards,
David.

reviews.author: Shauna B
reviews.review: As a home owner living far away it can be nerve racking leaving your home in the hands of a property manager and finding a good one can be daunting. Access has been generally fair and professional with somewhat reasonable fees compared to

reviews.author: Tanya Lopez
reviews.review: Not trying to hurt feelings, but I would like to express my concern, definitely poor management, trying to communicate to solve a smoked issue and other problem in my apartment, been living here 6 months and since move in the concern of the

reviews.author: JeshUa Morgan
reviews.review: Company is very shady. We will be filing a small claims case against them. I have pictures and videos of how I left my apartment on move out and when I got the invoice for my deposit I got back 168.00 out of 1100. Said they had extra

reviews.author: Hanna Adams
reviews.review:
I was completely SCAMMED by this company!
Do not give them your money.

ownerResponse.text: Hanna, we certainly are not running any kind of scam.  We have to pay to have your credit and criminal background check performed.  We also have to pay employees to evaluate your credit score and background check.  Those items are not free.  More

reviews.author: Andrea Paszkowski
reviews.review: They are wonderful. So easy to work with and they get back to you quickly if anything is needed (maintenance, etc). Best property management company experience I've ever had.

reviews.author: Laura Briscoe
reviews.review: Over the years, weve worked with a handful of property management companies.  Only been with Access for a year now, but we are impressed and here to stay.  Bryan is so easy to work with.  The communication with us is excellent, and I can

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Laura, thank you so much for your kind words.  We really appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review.  Best Regards,
David

reviews.author: Emma Rogers
reviews.review: Access is by far the best property management company I've had in Bellingham. Their rentals are reasonably priced, well maintained, and Bryan is quick to respond to questions/maintenance requests. Everyone I've delt with is friendly and accommodating. I would gladly recommend Access to anyone searching for a rental!

reviews.author: Eileen Turk
reviews.review: We have had Assess Real Estate Services manage our rental property for over six years now.  Access has been great at contacting us whenever a service issue has come up and   coordinating repairs with the service providers and our tenant.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks so much for your kind words. It's a pleasure to be of service for you!

reviews.author: Tara Almond
reviews.review: I've worked with Access Real Estate Services both as a tenant first and then as a property owner. Having been a renter for most of my life it was important to me to find a property management company that would not only treat my tenants

reviews.author: Joel Harmon
reviews.review: So far I have had an amazing experience with this team. Both Rachel and Janine have had outstanding customer service. I felt welcome right away. I have been a renter for the last two decades and have had my fair share of "slumlords." I

ownerResponse.text: Joel, thank you so much for taking the time to express your thoughts.  It's our pleasure to be of great service to you!

reviews.author: Eileen Lanthier
reviews.review: Bryan at Access has been so amazing and helpful throughout the two years Ive been renting from them. My roommates and I have just signed onto our third year and we hope to continue using Access for all our rental needs in the future!

ownerResponse.text: Eileen, thank for taking the time to provide this nice review.  We're glad your so happy with our services.  David

reviews.author: pau Borden
reviews.review: I believe Access PM is fabulous.  Their monthly statements are easy to understand and very clear.  I love working with Bryan Long.  He is very responsive to all my concerns as a property owner.

reviews.author: Chris Moye
reviews.review: I have a unique perspective in regards to the quality of Access Real Estate as I am both a tenant in one of the properties they manage as well as an employee of a service company that assists with some their maintenance needs.  I have had

reviews.author: Mary Gibb
reviews.review: Long Time Business Partner -  We've been a service provider for Access Real Estate for many years. They are top notch leasing company. They really take care to maintain the properties in a professional manner.  If I were choosing a company to care for my property, I would definitely consider Access and so should you!

reviews.author: Hugh Newmark
reviews.review:
I cannot emphasize what an abhorrent experience I had with Access.

My landlord switched from Hammer to Access and it was terrible. Our washer

reviews.author: marcia hoelzen
reviews.review: We own only one single family property right now but Access has managed various properties for us over the years.  Our experience has been quite good.  They have been responsive to us and to our tenants, resulting in long term rentals for us and well maintained properties.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Marcia, thank you so much for your kind words.  It is a pleasure providing great services for you!

reviews.author: Chris Klar
reviews.review: We own several rental properties in Bellingham and Access Real Estate has handled our property management needs since 2011. We're happy with the service that Rachel and her team provide and find that they are responsive to our concerns and needs. Dave provides excellent monthly financial reports. Peace of mind with Access.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks Chris, we really enjoy working with you.  Access Real Estate Services

reviews.author: Journey Oxford
reviews.review: I currently reside in a rental home that is managed by Access Real Estate Services LLC.  Shortly after I moved in. I noticed that the home was in desperate NEED of a new over the range microwave. The interior paint in the existing one was

ownerResponse.text: Hi Journey, thank you so much for taking the time to write a positive review.  We really appreciate that and we are happy to be of service!

reviews.author: RJ Halloran
reviews.review: So far, our experience with Access has been amazing! Bryan Long has done a great job responding to questions about our lease and general situation, which is a little atypical. Looking forward to renewing our lease and being with Access for years to come!

reviews.author: A Ben
reviews.review: I have been a tenant for almost 3 years now, and Access has been (by far) the best property management company I've ever rented from. They respond to my maintenance requests immediately (same day!) and have always had great communication with me. Consistent, professional, top notch service!

reviews.author: Nicole P
reviews.review: We are tenants of a rental home, family of four. We have been homeowners for 15 years, and were concerned about becoming tenants after our home sold, but we have been treated well and have a lovely home. The home was clean and in good

reviews.author: Peter Commons
reviews.review: Access has been managing our property for years. They are reliable, trustworthy, and quick to respond  which is super important to us as we don't live anywhere nearby.

reviews.author: Ben McKee
reviews.review: I've been with out the ability to use the kitchen sink for several weeks.  I've called and politely requested updates on repair timelines and scope of work on weekly basis without a call back.

ownerResponse.text: Ben, I've talked to staff regarding this matter and we've been doing everything we can to remedy the issue.  Best Rooter & Blythe plumbing have been to your unit already and it has been determined that the damage is well beneath the  More

reviews.author: Jon Goldberg
reviews.review: As a former employee of this company, you may understandably think my perspective to be biased. However, in my honest experience as a tenant at 2-3 other local companies here in Bellingham, I have come to realize that Access is absolutely

reviews.author: Samantha Hoffman (Sam)
reviews.review:
Me and my roommates found a property they had posted and applied immediately because we have been struggling to find a place for while now.
I called to ask some questions the next day when they were open and I was met

ownerResponse.text: Hi Samantha, this is David I am one of the owners of Access.  I'm sorry your attempt to work with us was so frustrating.  If you and your roommates meet our income qualifications, you wouldn't need a cosigner.  I don't know if that is the  More

reviews.author: Brian Hoelzen
reviews.review: We have had three different properties that Access managed for us.  They have done a great job for us and I believe for our tenants as well.  One property has had the same tenant for nearly 4 years.  I have to give Access credit for making that happen!

reviews.author: amanda apitz
reviews.review: The staff is incredibly rude. They also over charge for slum accommodations.  They have zero compassion and terrible customer service.

ownerResponse.text: Amanda, we do not provide after-hours lockout service.  Tenants are responsible for maintaining possession of keys to units at all times.  If an after-hours lockout occurs, a locksmith must be called and all charges are the tenant's  More

reviews.author: Anne Kucera
reviews.review: Our condo association has worked with Access for 4.5 years.  As a Board member, I especially appreciate the high level of service we received during a complete rehabilitation project that involved a special assessment.  Rachel, David, and

reviews.author: 1One Love
reviews.review: Before paying the application fees I wanted to make sure I wouldn't get denied, yet I was. Wasted time, money. They seem to know nothing about their rentals. Very rude, misleading information, these people are power hungry and discriminate against the disabled and low income families. Unwillingly to help if in a rut, they don't care.

reviews.author: Alissa Reynolds
reviews.review: My room mates and I attempted to schedule a viewing of an apartment. When we did so, we were told that we didn't meet the minimum requirements, when no minimum requirements were listed for the property. I called Access, and was then

ownerResponse.text: Hi Alissa, I appreciate your feedback.  I'll check on the listings to see if all of the pertinent information is available.  We do typically mention the income requirements and note when co-signers are not allowed, but we may have reposted an old ad without all the data.

reviews.author: Kasey Cleek
reviews.review: I found the process of getting a rental with access real estate difficult and nerve-racking. Access appeared to have little knowledge of the property they were renting, for example, we were sent to set up utility services with city hall

ownerResponse.text: Hi Kasey, I'm sorry your initial experience with Access wasn't great.  If you'd like to discuss the issue further, pleas give me a ring at our office 360-685-0123.  I'd be happy to talk to you.  Regards, David

reviews.author: Red Maple
reviews.review: I found Access Real Estate Services LLC to be professional and easy to work with. Everything  is clear, simple, and straightforward. I'm happy to have this company to manage my rental property. I would highly recommend it!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much for your kind words.

reviews.author: treehouse98221
reviews.review: As past treasurer of a medium-sized condominium association, I worked closely with Access Reality and with David Long in particular. David handled our financials effectively, responsibly, and accurately. He provided monthly 20+ page reports

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your kind words, much appreciated!

reviews.author: Rye Bow
reviews.review: Access Management was late paying for our bills and incurred a late fee which was unaddressed to this point. They have played the owners against each other in order to save face. It is very sad to see such manipulation from a hired agent.

reviews.author: Neil McCrea
reviews.review: When we hired Access Real Estate services to represent our Condo Association, the board was a shambles of petty, vindictive infighting.  Access handled often painful clash of personalities and wills with consummate professionalism and a

ownerResponse.text: The flea issue was an unfortunate thing related to prior tenants.  We addressed that issue promptly and at that point the unit was livable.  Like all rentals in Bellingham proper, this unit is subject to inspection by the city.  This unit  More

reviews.review: Access Real Estate Services is garbage. My wife and I had just moved up here and were looking for an apartment to rent. Before paying the application fees we wanted to make sure we wouldn't get denied. They were very eager to answer our

reviews.author: Toribio Morales
reviews.review: The folks at access work very hard to ensure a clean and safe living area for their tenants. They are fair and are often available to help. If you do what you're supposed to do as a tenant they take good care of you. I highly recommend them and would rent from them again.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Toribio, it's a pleasure to be of service to you!

reviews.author: Holly Harkener
reviews.review: My condo building's HOA uses this company, and it is a nightmare. The responsiveness and care is almost non-existent. Only one person has ever been able to answer a question of mine, and he's one of the owners. The folks who answer the

reviews.review:
I have  several  properties with Acces, the have managed them for me
for several years.
I am very happy with the job the are doing. .Dave and Rachel have a good

ownerResponse.text: Thanks Lothar!  You're always a pleasure to work for!

reviews.author: Casey Norman
reviews.review: Access RES is handling a rental property for us.  They have done a great job managing the property and updating us with any issues or concerns.  Renewing the tenant lease was a breeze.  Since we are living out of state it gives me peace of mind that I don't need to worry.  Thank You!!

ownerResponse.text: Thanks Casey!

reviews.author: Steven Kelly
reviews.review: I was on the Board of a condominium association for several years that used Access as the Association Managers.  During my tenure I found that Access consistently failed to follow through on their commitments, failed to adhere to a key

ownerResponse.text: Steve, I will just mention this -- you came in to our office and proceeded to use profanity.  I informed you in no uncertain terms that your behavior was unacceptable.  I think most folks can figure things out from here. I have no idea why you feel inclined to make derogatory and false comments a year after the fact.

reviews.author: Andrew Fowler
reviews.review:
I wish I could give this company a zero star. The customer service is awful. They do such a poor job at maintaining their property.
We pay $300 a month for our HOA fee, who knows what that money goes for. We

ownerResponse.text: Andrew, I've check our system and talked to every staff member.  You are not a association owner, tenant, or rental owner in our system.  I simply do not know who you are.  If you contact our office and let us where you are located, we'd be happy to help.

reviews.author: Cheryll Greenwood Kinsley
reviews.review: Access Real Estate has given us exemplary service for almost five years. They are responsive, courteous, and always on top of whatever needs to be done. We recommend them highly.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you D!

reviews.author: dan L
reviews.review: As a service provider, I have been doing business with Access for a few years now. They have always been professional, courteous, and understanding of the work that we provide. It is always a pleasure working with this company.

reviews.author: Andrea Demlow
reviews.review: My roommates and I have been tenants of a house managed by access for the past 2 years and I would never recommend their company to anyone. I dont say this out of spite, but to save others from the grief. They are rude and unprofessional when it comes to property logistics and communication, and they do not answer the phone.

reviews.review: They have been managing properties for the family for some time now. They do residential, multifamily and commercial for us. I highly recommend them as they are extremely responsive to tenant and owner needs. Great firm, good to work with.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks for your kind words Mike.  We love doing business with you!

reviews.author: Kelli Quiroga
reviews.review: Kelly in reception is awesome!!! The whole process of getting a rental was super simple. I have a good feeling my tenancy will be an easy time too. Thanks Access :)

ownerResponse.text: Wow, thank you so much for taking the time to speak well of us.  I'll be sure to mention your kind words to Kelly as well.

reviews.author: Scott M
reviews.review: Access has been excellent from day one!  Have worked with several local Property Management firms over the last 8+ years, and they're the best around.  Highly Recommend!!

reviews.author: Jacob Hiebert
reviews.review: Access realty is a business that you should avoid. Although, they found us a great property for a good price, they were very unprofessional and rude. Could not ask the boss a question without them throwing out rude accusations.

ownerResponse.text: Jacob, I'm not sure what you are talking about specifically.  Would you be so kind as to let me know what your questions was that didn't get answered.  Regards, David

reviews.author: Sam Roth
reviews.review: We work directly with Access Real Estate on a regular basis.  We are proud of this partnership and would not hesitate to recommend them to any one!

reviews.author: Brenna Grace
reviews.review: We just started renting from them, and they made the whole process incredibly easy and smooth to get the apartment, unlike so many other rental management companies in the area.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the kind words Brenna.  Much appreciated!  Access Real Estate Services

reviews.author: Craig Gunst
reviews.review: I provide electrical service work for Access.  They always have knowledge of the property I am going to and everyone in the office are very professional and helpful with any questions that I may have.  Very great company to do work for.

reviews.author: Doug Taube
reviews.review: I hve never been treated as rude,unethical by a buisness include owners wife.i hve been n bham 28yrs.hve worked,owned small buisness.and #1is treat others as u would want b treated.i hope this comp.will b liable for writting a lease for a

ownerResponse.text: Doug, I'm sorry you feel the way you do.  What you don't realize here is that we, as property managers, do not get to make all of the decisions.  The owners of complexes often insist on rent increases after they have made investments in the  More

reviews.author: Yvonne Carson
reviews.review: Access Real Estate Services is the management company for our Homeowner Association. I have found them easy to work with and quick to respond to questions.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks Yvonne, I was glad to see you joined the board!

reviews.author: Dan Altman
reviews.review: Access has rented and  taken care of my renal houses for many years . They have been easy and great to work with .

reviews.author: tom cruzana
reviews.review: Access is awesome! I've been a tenant for over 4 years and they have continuously provided excellent customer service.

reviews.author: Kim Dokken
reviews.review: Access Real Estate is wonderful. They are always attentive to all our needs. The staff is professional and personal.

reviews.author: Software Patriot
reviews.review: Constant hurdles with them to get anything fixed.  Expect at least 2 weeks to get anything done with them.  Refused to do have anyone present for the final walk through.  Shady...

reviews.author: Alexander Bullock
reviews.review: Rude! Absolutely rude never ever look into these guys. Asked them nice questions about cost, viewings and application payment, 9/10 the lady would be rude or hang up and not call back.

reviews.author: Kristen Ryan
reviews.review:
This company is disgraceful. The trick and deceive students into signing unnecessary forms. STUDENTS BEWARE!!! READ everything before you sign.
DISHONEST. DECEITFUL.DECEPTIVE. That sums it up.

reviews.author: Grant DeRemer
reviews.review: I have worked with the staff at Access for many years and have always found them very professional and easy to work with. I recommend this company.

reviews.author: Dependable Cleaning
reviews.review: We have worked with Access for many years they are great to work with. Very responsive and professional.

reviews.author: Laura Bethany
reviews.review: My mother tried to apply for a rental through this company, and she was treated horribly.

reviews.author: Marko Polo 0069
reviews.review: I've worked with these people for years and they always seem to do their best to satisfy their tenants.

reviews.author: Kimberly Madsen (Sunfireray)
reviews.review: This is a company that takes what they do seriously.  Working there I found it easy to get the information I need in order to do my job.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Kimberly!

reviews.author: Gerry Maxfield
reviews.review: All my friends only have negative things to say about this business. Horrible customer service and predatory lease agreements. Avoid renting from them!!!

reviews.author: Heather Kelsey
reviews.review: Both the receptionist and Rachel did not offer help when I seeked documents. They also did not provide such documents.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Heather, what documents were you looking for?  If it is something we are permitted to release to you, I can see that you get copies.  Please let me know.  David

reviews.author: Corvett Higdon
reviews.review: Wish there was more 3bedrooms but the site is easy to use

reviews.author: Sara Tilley
reviews.review: VERY PLEASED WITH ACCESS REAL ESTATE SERVICES.  THEY HAVE GOTTEN WAY HIGHER RENTS THAN WE HAD BY RENTING IT OUR SELVES

reviews.author: Rosa Marie
reviews.review: Just asked to see if a unit was available. Girl was extremely rude.

reviews.author: Robert Oswald
reviews.review: Have been wonderful

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review.  We always appreciate that!

reviews.author: Dana Burnidge
reviews.review: Friendly staff, great to rent with.

reviews.author: Ann Lavigne
reviews.review: They are very unproffessional and rude

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Ann, I don't see your name in our system any where.  Would you mind elaborating on your comment so I can see if there is something I can help you with.

David Long
Thank you for the review!

Hi Brenda, I actually asked for your rating to be removed because there is no evidence that you were either a tenant or a client of ours.  If you worked with us with a different last name, please let me know.  I like to investigate things  More

Hi Anna, I believe you called our office earlier today and asked whether you could pay your rent late.  You were informed there would be late rent fees if rent was not paid on time.  This policy is spelled out explicitly in your lease.  More
Hi John, thank you for taking the time to give a 5 star, much appreciated.  It's a pleasure working with you!
